channel.title: udt on Unladen swallow - Olivier Wulveryck
channel.description: Recent content in udt on Unladen swallow - Olivier Wulveryck

item.title: HTTP over UDT for inter-region file transfer
item.description: Introduction Transferring files between server is no big deal with nowadays network equipments. You use rsync, scp or even http to get a file from A to B. Of course, you rely on the TCP stack so you have a decent reliability in the transport. But TCP has its drawback, especially when it needs to go through a lot of equipments. Typically in the cloud, or over a VPN.
